Hi David,
   It's Mark. I would really appreciate it if your friend could give me any info. about making samurai armour. I don't even really know where to start or what materials are the best to use. It would greatly help me out. Thanks for your time. Hope to hear from you or your friend soon.
                                                  Thanks a bundle,
                                                       Mark
